name: Doodle Santa Lite
description:
Free Version of Doodle Santa
Help Doodle Santa deliver all the presents on the busiest night of the year. Enjoy this Christmas with the most addictive fast-paced festive puzzle game.


Onteca have teamed up with the students of Darwen Aldridge Community Academy to bring to you DOODLE SANTA and the MIDNIGHT RUSH.

Doodle Santa pushes the player's accuracy level to the limits. During the Midnight Rush an assortment of coloured presents and characters are released that need to be sorted. The player must think fast and act just as quickly in order to deliver the right presents to the correct house.

Doodle Santa starts you out slowly, gradually releasing presents, however as the speed picks up this game takes multitasking to a whole new level.

It's the night before Christmas and Doodle Santa needs YOUR help!

**FEATURES**
Skills to learn: Colour matching and multi-tasking.
Highly addictive.
Physics based movement.
Characters designed by the students at Darwen Aldridge Community Academy.


Darwen Aldridge Community Academy
www.daca.uk.com

Onteca
www.onteca.com
